mn102:4.5: The phrasing here is a little odd. But I can't see a justification for the way BB has construed the syntax.
mn102:11.3: BB has “rushing onward” for uddham saram, while Hornner has loftily maintain attachment. But it seems to me the point is related to the common phrase uddhamsoto, i.e. heading upstream, i.e. getting reborn in a higher realm.
